action.description: The committee on PBS recommend that the measure be HELD. The recommendation was not adopted.  The votes were as follows: 3 Ayes: Representative(s) Iwamoto, Ichiyama; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Belatti; 3 Noes: Representative(s) Poepoe, Shimizu, Souza; and 4 Excused: Representative(s) Hashem, Lamosao, Morikawa, Woodson.
